title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When a new file is created on Windows using Eclipse, it does not have Unix line delimiters, even though the end product is a Unix product.
EB: When a new file is created on Windows using Eclipse, it should have Unix line delimiters, since the end product is a Unix product. There should be a UI (Preference) provided by the Workbench to define the line delimiter for new files. The UI should have options for Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. This UI should be available to all plugins to ensure consistent line delimiters for new files.
SR: To reproduce the issue, use a Unix and Windows workstation to develop a Unix product/program. Create a new file using Eclipse on Windows and observe that it does not have Unix line delimiters.
